name: Strategic-consulting
description: We study the impact of technologies on industries and consumer behavior, identify threats and opportunities which arise with the spread of new technologies.

name: Analytics-research
description: We study industries, competitors and consumers. We collect and analyze data to make reasoned decisions. We prepare materials to support external communication and other business development activities.

name: Trainings
description: We conduct intensive trainings on new technologies and digital transformation We stimulate changes by raising awareness of employees and top-managers.
